item.title: Week 1: Introduction / Orientation
item.description: Welcome to PSY 490: Advanced current topics in neuroscience

item.title: Week 2: Behaviour
item.description: The ongoing development of behavioural analysis in neuroscience has been prompted and supported by the rapidly developing technology sector. Pipelines to analyze behaviour are becoming more efficient and informative.

item.title: Week 3: Pharmacology
item.description: Pharmacological (aka drug-based) approaches have been used to investigate alterations in animal behaviour since the advent of the study of neuroscience.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
